topicTitle: ADD 67th WAY, AND BRING BACK OLD DEVTOWN

posts.postText: I think I speak for most people on the server. 67th was a good map but we need at least v3, and I Don't really like the new devtown because, Windows are purple, ladders are only use-able by hands, and too much fog.
I want 67th way back but I like the new Devtown, It supports 22 players much better.

No. Bring Both the maps back.
+Support.

wait my monthly map idea is actually coming true 


<3 you guys

Don't get me wrong but I believe udane's devtown shouldn't be replaced by the old one, we have played on the old one for so long and have gotten used to it. I think both should be put into the rotation and as for 67thway, that map needs to be added bad.

>> If anything bring richland back 

No.

+support for both
But, give them a choice between udane version and old one in nominate

I hate devtown with every fiber of my body.

>> If anything bring richland back 

This. I've been haggling Gash to do this for almost a year.
